name: Pocket Witch Garden
description:
Help Millet, a little witch protect her garden from the many pests seeking to eat all her hard-grown gourds and pumpkins. Use simple controls to make her trusty magic pumpkin bounce around and hit enemies where it hurts most.

Try to beat your hi-score and discover the 3 unique bosses waiting for you, can you beat them all and prevent Millet's garden from being devoured?
